attributes.additional_details:
George Galloway is not fit to be a Member of Parliament in the United Kingdom House of Commons.

He has shown himself to be a man of abysmally poor judgement and character, whether it be his long standing association with some of the world's most brutal dictators (such as the late Saddam Hussein), or his inflammatory comments which directly raise tensions against our forces fighting in Afghanistan and Iraq.

We ask that you consult with the relevant Commons authorities to work towards suspending or revoking George Galloway's membership, and request an investigation into how a man of his associations and record was eligible to once again stand as a Parliamentary candidate.
